tree.text: You currently have free time between classes

choices.title: Take a Break at the HUB

tree.text: The TA clarified many misunderstandings. (Understanding Up)
Your study time at the library was productive. (Diligence Up)
You spent time talking with Friend A. (Charisma Up)
You went to your next class.
You've arrived to the University of Washington, and begin moving your belongings into the dorm. Your new roommate is already there. You look around and notice they haven't unpacked yet.
"Hi! What side of the room do you want? I'd like the left side with the bigger window, but I'm fine with anything"

choices.title: Sure, you can have the left side, I'll take the right
Uh, I want the left side

tree.text: You begin unpacking your things on to the right side of the room. You notice afterwards that theres some kind of weird black spots between the bed and the wall
You begin unpacking your things on the left side of the room.
You pull out an old quarter from your backpocket. Your roommates calls tails for the left side, heads for the right side.

choices.title: Your flip resulted in a tails. Your roommate begins unpacking on the left side. Continue
Your flip resulted in a heads. Your roommate begins unpacking on the right side. Continue

tree.text: You finished unpacking and you're content with your room. Your friends text you that they just finished moving in and they want to explore Seattle. Your roommate mentions feeling a little bit hungry.

choices.title: Ask your roommate if he wants to join you and your friends
